spec.0.1.1: Mention RGB-dialogues as a possible use case.
spec.0.2.0: Add the concept of canonical context values and direct-mapped context values to the specification.
spec.0.3.0: Extend on how to determine whether a implementation follows the standard or not regarding the extension specs.
spec.0.5.0: Add instructions for word splitting for ungendered-word-warnings to the specification.
